titleStmt.title: The first day of the worldes creation: or of the first weeke of that most Christian poet, W. Salustius, Lord of Bartas
Sepmaine. Day 1. English
titleStmt.author: Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur, 1544-1590.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I. Iackeson, for Gregorie Seaton,

notesStmt.note: A translation of the first day of: La sepmaine.
Running title reads: The first day of the first weeke of du Bartas.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
